title: Wolfenstein II The New Colossus (+ Update 1, MULTI9)
description:
Repack Features

    Based on Wolfenstein.II.The.New.Colossus-CODEX ISO release: codex-wolfenstein.ii.the.new.colossus.iso (45,486,505,984 bytes)
    Wolfenstein.II.The.New.Colossus.Update.1-CODEX (102 MB) and missing languages for Update 1 (3.3 GB) installed over - thanks, Christsnatcher!
    100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
    NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
    Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 45.7 to 32.9~33.2 GB for any single language)
    Installation takes: ~2 hours on 8-cores CPU + SSD; ~4.5 hours on 4-cores CPU + HDD. Make sure to turn off any HDD activity on target drive - disable torrent, antivirus, etc.
    After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
    HDD space after installation: up to 48 GB (~78 GB during installation)
    Use "language.changer.exe" in game root to change the game language
    At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
    ATTENTION! If you're installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7, just in case

parsed.dn: Wolfenstein II The New Colossus (  Update 1, MULTI9)
parsed.name: Wolfenstein II The New Colossus (  Update 1, MULTI9)
